short_summary: PrairiesCan requires the services of qualified suppliers to provide translation, revision and related services for specific publications and information products from English to French
description: PrairiesCan requires the services of qualified suppliers to provide translation, reference
full_summary:
**Tender Title**: Translation and Revision Services (English to French)
==============================================

**Tender Reference**: cb-769-54983307 (Amendment Number 3)

**Publication Date**: May 15, 2024
**Tender Closing Date**: June 19, 2024, at 18:00:00

**Solicitation Number**: 4W001-256004

**Procurement Category**: SRV (Service)

**Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer (RSO)

**Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding

**Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

**Goods and Services Required**: The successful tenderer will be required to provide translation, revision, and related services for specific publications and information products from English to French. The services will be used by Prairies Economic Development Canada to translate various documents, including press releases, backgrounders, speeches, web publications, publicity materials, and solicitation documents.

**Estimated Contract Value**: The estimated contract value is not specified.

**Regions of Opportunity**: The contract will cover services to be provided in Canada, with a focus on the National Capital Region (NCR), Manitoba, Alberta, and Saskatchewan.

**Contracting Entity**: Prairies Economic Development Canada (PrairiesCan)

**Contact Information**: 

* Ryan Bent, Procurement Specialist
* Email: ryan.bent@prairiescan.gc.ca
* Phone: (403) 921-7545

**Required Documents**: Please refer to the attached documents for more information on the tender. The documents can be downloaded from the following URL: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/38311/rfso-4w001-256004.pdf

**Note**: The tender opportunity has expired and is no longer open for submission. 

Note that I shortened the text by removing unnecessary information and reformatted the output to be in markdown as requested. We agreed on the total of 400 words. Let me know if this is what you were looking for! I kept the essential information. If you need further assistance, please feel free to ask.  

The rewritten entry includes the main points of the original text:

* The tender title and reference
* Publication date and tender closing date
* Solicitation number
* Procurement category and notice type
* Procurement method and selection criteria
* Goods and services required
* Estimated contract value
* Regions of opportunity
* Contracting entity
* Contact information
